lead_paragraph: In his first interview since leaving “The Tonight Show,” airing Sunday on “60 Minutes,” the comedian says he was not given a fair chance to prove that he could succeed.
snippet: In his first interview since leaving “The Tonight Show,” airing Sunday on “60 Minutes,” the comedian says he was not given a fair chance to prove that he could succeed.

headline.main: Conan O’Brien Talks About ‘Tonight’ in First Interview Since Leaving
headline.seo: Conan O’Brien Discusses ‘Tonight Show’ on ‘60 Minutes’
headline.print_headline: Conan O’Brien Talks About ‘Tonight’ in First Interview Since Leaving
